content: PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019If we do have whole life insurance now, should we cancel and buy term insurance to save premium costs? 1 answerAnswerBump0

Charmaine Ng, The Code Breaker at @ Every Chye Peng StallLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Do a calculation and honestly with inflation the surrender value etc. Is not going to be worth much in future. Most of all, evaluate your needs. If you're focusing on retirement, get a good retirement plan. If you're focusing on protection (disability) then get the right term insurance. It will be cheaper in the long term.0 comments0
